FuncDef: This command allows the user to override the LSP operational metric with a constant administrative value that will not change regardless of the actual path the LSP is using over its lifetime.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the integer value which specifies the value of the LSP administrative metric. A value of zero command reverts to the default setting and disables the administrative LSP metric. Values-0 to 16777215.

ExtraInfo: Default: no metric. The LSP operational metric defaults to the metric returned by MPLS.
